Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
From: Adam Johnson
To: James Petrucci, Lee Plourde
Date: 2019/08/14 17:29
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

---------- Original message ---------
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 2:44 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) . @nysd.uscourts.gov>
Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490

>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) _08/12/2019 14:44>>>
Dear Judge Berman,

I will be happy to do so. Please let me know if I can be of further assistance.

Thank you,
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-(b)(6)
f: (646)836-7665

>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> 8/12/2019 2:42 PM >>>
(b)(6), please thank the Warden for his prompt response to my letter.
Richard M. Berman

On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> wrote:

fyi

----- Forwarded by Christine Murray/NYSD/02/USCOURTS on 08/12/2019 02:37 PM -----

From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
To: "Lamine N'Diaye" @bop.gov>, <BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>
Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @att.net>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>
Date: 08/12/2019 02:33 PM
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490

Good afternoon,

Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information.

Thank you,
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-(b)(6)
f: (646)836-7665
